  :::Torca/Sky Lynx/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion:: 

  ::Torca dodges all of t=
he laser blasts.  the granade misses him, but some of 
  the sonic energy h=
its him.  He modifies his dorsal gun to nail gun mode and 
  fires 9 nails =
at Breakdown, 8 at Dark One, and 8 at Astral.  he sees Klant 
  crawling ba=
ck to him:: 
  Torca: You alright Klant? if not, get into a CR chamber, bec=
ause you look 
  pretty beaten up. 
  ::Sky Lynx flies to escape the fireba=
lls, but one hits him anyway.  He only 
  gets hit by one ion disk.  he dod=
ges the shots from Ares.  He fired 2 missles 
  from one gun at Pyro, 1 mis=
sle from the other at Manterror, and 1 missle at 
  Ares.  Ratchet transfor=
med to robot mode and escaped most of the shots, 
  thoguh some hit him in =
the arms.  Ratchet jumped out of the way of the connon 
  blast, and ended =
up being hit by some of Fenox's laser bolts.  He fired 15 
  shots from eac=
h of his blasters at Scavenger and launched 1 explosive tusk 
  blades at S=
ixshot, and one at Fenox.  Sideswipe escapes the sword blade.  He 
  got hi=
t by 2 stinger missles and 5 optic blasts(between Injector and 
  Bumblebee=
). He fired 25 shots at Demon Wulf, 1 missle at Injector, and 1 
  missle a=
t Bumblebee.  Orion destroyed the missles with ones of his own and 
  fired=
 a missle, hoping to hit Double Punch.  He evaded the shots fr! om! Ares 
 =
 and fired a missle at him.  He escapes the darts and fires 25 rapid fire 
=
  optic blasts at Starlight::
